table.Name: wcms_Register
table.Title: post6_register
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Register where ({@PID}=0 OR Register_PostID = {@PID}) { AND Register_Name <o> @Search:Register_Name } { AND Register_From <o> @Search:Register_From } )
if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Register_ID] ,[EmailType] ,[Register_From] ,DATEADD(hour, {@TIMEZONE}, Register_Date) as [Register_Date] ,[Register_Subject] ,[Register_Read] ,0 as [locked] ,Register_Name ,Register_Phone ,case Register_Sex when 1 then 'Male' else 'Female' end as [Register_Sex] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Register_ID] ,(case Register_Type when 1 then 'Contact' when 2 then 'Sales' when 3 then 'Booking' when 4 then 'A Require from User' when 5 then 'Appt' else '' end) as [EmailType] ,Register_From ,[Register_Date] ,[Register_Subject] ,[Register_Read] ,Register_Name ,Register_Phone ,Register_Sex from wcms_Register where ({@PID}=0 OR Register_PostID = {@PID}) { AND Register_Name <o> @Search:Register_Name } { AND Register_From <o> @Search:Register_From } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: Update wcms_Register set [Register_Read] = 1 where Register_ID = @editID select [Register_ID] ,Register_Name ,[Register_From] ,[Register_Date] ,[Register_Subject] ,[Register_Message] ,[Register_Phone] ,[Register_Address] ,Register_Sex ,Register_Position ,Register_Company ,(Select '#' + cast(Post_ID as varchar(10)) + ' [' + Post_Title + ']' from wcms_Post where Post_ID = Register_PostID) as [Post] from wcms_Register where Register_ID = @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete from wcms_Register where Register_ID = @delID select 1
